name: Writing your first AIR Native Extension
body:
This repository contains code to go along with the article "Writing your first AIR Native Extension" written for [Flash & Flex Developer's Magazine](http://ffdmag.com/).

The native extension created here allows an [AIR for iOS](http://www.adobe.com/devnet/air/air_for_ios.html) app to access the [Twitter framework](https://developer.apple.com/library/ios/#documentation/Twitter/Reference/TwitterFrameworkReference/_index.html) provided by [iOS 5](http://www.apple.com/ios/), allowing Flash apps to seamlessly integrate with [Twitter](https://twitter.com/).
